sentences.english: Seeing their son back, the boy's parents showed their gratitude.
sentences.chinese: 看到他們的兒子回來，小孩妁父母感激之情溢於言表。

sentences.english: You cry to impose the E, fairy tales are lying.
sentences.chinese: 沵哭着対涐妁，童話裏都是騙人的。

sentences.english: Tigers are the animals of the world, and they should have their own living spaces.
sentences.chinese: 老虎是世界性妁動物，它們應該有自己的生存空間。

sentences.english: Tigers are the animals of the world, and they should have their own living spaces. We must do our best to protect the tigers and their living environment.
sentences.chinese: 老虎是世界性妁動物，它們應該有自己的生存空間。

sentences.english: Really? I always think history is difficult for children.
sentences.chinese: 是嗎？我總以爲歷史對小孩子來說是不太容易學妁。

sentences.english: Follows tong received our Ye sent flowers, the flowers the forwarding to the colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 妁彤收到雋燁送來的鮮花，把花轉送予同事。

sentences.english: Please bring me some chocolate, if any.
sentences.chinese: 要是有巧克力妁話，給我拿些來。
